name: lumiose-galette
effect: Cures all major status ailments and confusion.
short_effect: Cures all major status ailments and confusion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
